page.title: 16FARM SURVEY.
page.content: Some farms in our area are owned by the Duchy of Cornwall, but{an average {farmer}has run his own farm with the help of one employed farmhand for 19 years,working 10 hours a day,7 days a week,following in the footsteps of a previous generation. He enjoys farming and spends most of his time tending stock and crops, sharing his larger equipment with neighbours. His hobbies include shooting,gardening,riding,read ing,fishing,sailing and other sports. {An average farm}has 156 acres divided into 18 fields growing the following crops in order of predominance:-grass, barley,corn,potatoes,kale,rape,wheat, turnips,hay,silage,oats,peas,suedes and fruit. {Most farmers}keep poultry and working cats and dogs,but only a few keep pigs goats,horses or donkeys.
